_filenamePatternComment: The file name pattern can contain any previous variable plus 'firstDayOfWeek' and 'lastDayOfWeek'
_groupIdComment: The default group is Linagora GSO, you can assign another group by searching the associated number in the OBM planning. If not specified it will use the default group id of your account profile.
_linshareWorkspace: the linshare workspace where to upload files
_linshareFolder: the linshare workspace folder (under the workspace) where to upload files. Can be the workspace itself
_workersFileComment: a file containing all workers that will be used for a multi followup
